fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 368.42 lakh crore compared with Rs 186.55 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 164.80 points or 0.93% to settle at 17,589.60. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, advanced 2.20% to 12.73. Adani Enterprises, Reliance Industries (RIL) and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The March 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 March 2023.
